definitions.definition: A distinctive outfit that serves to identify members of a group , company , prison inmates , etc.
alternative letter-case form of Uniform from the NATO/ICAO Phonetic Alphabet .
A uniformed police officer (as opposed to a detective ).

main_definition: A distinctive outfit that serves to identify members of a group , company , prison inmates , etc.
secondary_definitions: ( international standards ) alternative letter-case form of Uniform from the NATO/ICAO Phonetic Alphabet .
( law enforcement ) A uniformed police officer (as opposed to a detective ).
